byline: Stan Alcorn, Scott Tong, Sam Harnett, David Gura and Kai Ryssdal
title: Marketplace for Monday October 20, 2014
description: IBM is paying someone $1.5 billion to buy its chipmaker division. Sometimes it’s more cost effective to pay someone to take a division off your hands than to wind it down yourself. Plus, The drop in oil prices looks like a sustained drop - which amounts to a 20 percent discount on one of the global economy’s chief drivers. This is a dramatic economic development with many potential consequences.
